homeBlocks.title: Welcome to the Adventure
homeBlocks.content: Join Mario and Sonic in an epic crossover adventure! Experience the thrill of two gaming legends coming together in this exciting platformer.

homeBlocks.title: Power-Ups Guide
homeBlocks.content: Master the art of power-ups! From Super Stars to Speed Shoes, learn how to use each power-up to maximize your gameplay.

homeBlocks.title: Player Reviews
homeBlocks.content: See what other players are saying about their Mario and Sonic adventures. Join our growing community of enthusiasts!

homeBlocks.title: Spin Dash Secrets
homeBlocks.content: Unlock the secrets of Sonic's signature move and discover how to combine it with Mario's abilities for maximum effect.

homeBlocks.title: Traps and Dangers
homeBlocks.content: Navigate through challenging obstacles and avoid dangerous traps. Learn the patterns and master your timing!

homeBlocks.title: Level-Up Challenges
homeBlocks.content: Push your skills to the limit with our special challenges. Earn achievements and compete with players worldwide!

additionalSections.title: Gameplay Mechanics
additionalSections.subtitle: Master the Controls
additionalSections.content: Discover the unique gameplay mechanics that blend Mario's acrobatic moves with Sonic's speed abilities. Learn advanced techniques and combinations to overcome challenging levels.

additionalSections.title: World Exploration
additionalSections.subtitle: Discover Amazing Worlds
additionalSections.content: Explore beautifully crafted worlds that combine elements from both Mario and Sonic universes. Find hidden secrets, collect special items, and unlock new areas.

additionalSections.title: Multiplayer Features
additionalSections.subtitle: Play Together
additionalSections.content: Team up with friends or compete against them in various multiplayer modes. Experience the thrill of cooperative gameplay or test your skills in competitive challenges.

additionalSections.title: Achievements & Rewards
additionalSections.subtitle: Earn & Collect
additionalSections.content: Complete special challenges and earn unique rewards. Unlock new characters, costumes, and abilities as you progress through the game.
